p: In a study conducted by Uemura et al. (2018), perillaldehyde was administered in doses of 50, 100 or 200 mg/kg orally once daily for up to 17 days, and colitis was induced by 2% DSS solutions. The results showed that the administration of perillaldehyde (100 mg/kg) attenuated the weight loss and the colon damage of the mice.
